msg: Hey, welcome to the field. You'll be taking over where I left off around here.
I won't waste words. Things are pretty simple hereâ€”don't get hit, and shoot the enemy.
Don't interrupt. You will have to get used to your [color=red]time-slow[/color] abilities. They'll allow you to slow certain colors of bullets down.
Let me throw an easy attack at you for some practice.
Hold [color=red]X[/color] to slow down [color=yellow]light[/color] bullets. Hold [color=red]C[/color] to slow down [color=green]dark[/color] bullets.
Good. Told ya it wasn't hard.
Now, we're looking for some kinda large monster. Been terrorizing the area for some time now.
So, keep an eye out for anything suspicious.
You're on your own. Good luck.
Okay, that's it. We, uh, don't have a proper ending screen for this. So just close out the game I guess...
